title: Limpia & Energy Healing — Casa Alchemista Botanica & Wellness
cleaned_text: ............... $111.00 Limpia is the Spanish word for clean or cleanse. A limpia is an energy cleansing ritual using plants, resins, and herbs practiced traditionally in many Latin American cultures. Energy healing channels universal energy for stress reduction, relaxation and promotes physical/emotional healing. during the session, the client may feel physical sensations, see colors or imagery, access insights, and/or have vivid recall of thoughts & memories.
